Projects.title: Website Project Process Management
desc: A Project Process Management website built with ReactJS, MySQL, and ASP.NET. This platform allows students to track their progress while working on their projects.It also helps teachers manage students more easily, including scheduling, reviewing, commenting, grading, and more. I hope this project will minimize errors and make it easier for both students and teachers to manage the graduation project process.

Projects.title: Social Facebook
desc: Social Facebook is a social media platform that allows users to connect, share posts, photos, and videos, comment, and interact with friends and groups. It features a news feed, messaging, and a marketplace, providing a space for both personal and professional interactions.

Projects.title: Yummly
desc: Yummly is a recipe management website designed to help users discover, save, and organize their favorite recipes easily. The platform allows users to browse a variety of dishes, view detailed cooking instructions, and filter recipes by ingredients, cuisine, or cooking time. Users can also create their own recipe collections and manage personal favorites. The goal of Yummly is to make cooking more enjoyable and efficient by providing a clean, user-friendly interface and smart features that support home cooks of all levels.

Projects.title: Chat Realtime
desc: Typerite is a modern and minimalistic blog website designed for sharing articles, thoughts, and personal stories. The platform focuses on clean typography and a distraction-free reading experience. It features a well-organized layout with categories, recent posts, and a responsive design that works smoothly across devices. Typerite is ideal for writers and bloggers who want a simple yet elegant space to publish their content.

Projects.title: Music player
desc: This is a music player project inspired by the popular ZingMP3 website, designed to provide a smooth and engaging user experience for streaming music. The project features a sleek and modern interface that mimics ZingMP3's clean design, offering users the ability to browse, play, and manage their favorite songs. Key features include a music playlist, song controls (play, pause, skip), a search bar, and album artwork display. The player also supports features like shuffle, repeat, and volume control. This project uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the front end, creating an interactive and responsive music player thatâ€™s easy to navigate.

Projects.title: Mua Ban
desc: This is a website designed for renting and selling houses, developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL, and HTTP. The website features a clean, user-friendly interface where users can browse available properties for rent or sale. It includes listings with property details, images, and filtering options. The front end is built with HTML and CSS, while JavaScript handles interactivity. The back end uses MySQL for database management, storing property information, and supporting HTTP requests for smooth data retrieval. The website provides an easy way for users to find their next home, with options for landlords and agents to list their properties.

Projects.title: Ping Pong
desc: A simple Ping Pong game can be created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It's a two-player game where each player controls a paddle to bounce the ball and try to score points and play with computer

Projects.title: Pronia
desc: The website is built using main tech (HTML, CSS, JS). The website also created based on the client design, and improved and sliced by me. The website has a few features such as a login page, register page,about page, a project page, and a contact page.

Although it is a static website without backend functionalities, it focuses on clear presentation, intuitive navigation, and aesthetic appeal. This project reflects the idea of promoting green living and making it easy for users to explore and select their favorite trees.
